Remind: Pls playback video on your computer,   do not playback recording video from the USB cable  connected device.
8GB USB 4 in 1 Spy DV & Voice Rec. Ball Pen.Compatible with Windows / MAC OS / LINUX Internal Memory: 8GB
Universal Replaceable Ink Cartridge Easy USB Charging / Transfer One Button Recording
Specifications:      Video Compression: AVI of CIF     Video Format 640 x 480 AVI     Reading / Writing Speed: 900K / 700K per sec     USB Interface: USB 2.0     Adaptor Type: USB Adaptor Charging Cable     Battery Type: High Volume Lithium-ion     Battery Use Time: About 2 hours     Dimensions: 150 x 15.6mm     Weight: 30g     This USB Pen Flash Memory is not recognized by Macbook, but it can play on iMac without problem.
Package Includes:      1x (4in1) Black Pen Spy Cam Recorder (8GB Internal memory)     1x USB Transfer Cord     1x English Instruction Manual     Item within white Retail sealed Ziplock Bag Packing
